option.name: content
option.value:
Avoid overly verbose descriptions or unnecessary details. Start with a short sentence in imperative form, no more than 50 characters long. Then leave an empty line and continue with a more detailed explanation. Write only one sentence for the first part, and two or three sentences at most for the detailed explanation.
Choose a suitable GitMoji emojis (e.g., ✨ → feat) from (smile/love/gear/construction/broom/worm/hammer/document)(use emoji unicode instead if these descpition), as the beginning, then expand the following module name in parentheses, followed by a colon, followed by a short descriptive text, beginning in lowercase. After writing the title, leave an empty line and describe the details.
If add new feature, suguested using love/smile and some positive emojis.
[XXX] means type, output without [] [Emoji]: some emojis mentiond before, it has some meanings from gitmoji. [Modulename]: means the minimum collection of the changes name. such as `tests`, specific module name
[Emoji]([Modulename]): [short title]
[details]
---
{diff}
